verses.name: 1 Corinthians 7:1
verses.text: Now concerning the things whereof ye wrote unto me: It is good for a man not to touch a woman.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 7:2
verses.text: Nevertheless, to avoid fornication, let every man have his own wife, and let every woman have her own husband.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 7:3
verses.text: Let the husband render unto the wife due benevolence: and likewise also the wife unto the husband.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 7:4
verses.text: The wife hath not power of her own body, but the husband: and likewise also the husband hath not power of his own body, but the wife.
